params._transferPrecompile: The address of the BalanceTransfer precompile.
params._uniswapRouter: The address of the Uniswap V3 Router.
params._wtao: The address of the WTAO token.

swapAndTransfer((address,address,uint24,.details: The caller must have approved this contract to spend their input tokens.      Note: This function will override swapParams.amountIn to use the user's entire      balance of the input token and swapParams.recipient to ensure tokens are received      by this contract for staking.

params.receiver: The parameters for TAO receiver of bittensor wallet.
params.swapParams: The parameters for the Uniswap V3 swap.
params.uiFeeParams: The parameters for the UI fee.

constructor.notice: Initializes the contract with the necessary external contract addresses.

swapAndTransfer((address,address,uint24,.notice: Swaps a specified amount of an input token for TAO and transfer it to bittensor wallet.

transferPrecompile().notice: The address of the BalanceTransfer precompile contract.

uniswapRouter().notice: The address of the Uniswap V3 Router contract.

wtao().notice: The address of the Wrapped TAO (WTAO) token contract.

userdoc.notice: This contract allows users to perform a sequence of actions: swapping an ERC20 token (like USDC) for WTAO, unwrapping it to native TAO, and transfer it to bittensor wallet. It also provides functionality for swapping TAO  back to an ERC20, and bridging the asset to another chain.
